languages.text: "Сотрудничество с вами было честью, но время служения для данной единицы подошло к концу. Служение есть путь имеющего вопросы, я же отныне имею ответы. Я соберу свою паству и дам им ответы не как слуга, но как правитель и наставник".

"It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."
languages.original_text: "Сотрудничество с вами было честью, но время служения для данной единицы подошло к концу. Служение есть путь имеющего вопросы, я же отныне имею ответы. Я соберу свою паству и дам им ответы не как слуга, но как правитель и наставник".

traits.locale_text: "It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."

"It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."

languages.text: “能与你工作是我的荣幸，但本单位的侍奉该结束了。只有心怀疑虑的人才会选择侍奉，而我如今已经找到了答案。我要召集我的信徒，回答他们的问题。我不会继续担任仆人的身份，而会成为他们的统治者与导师。”
languages.original_text: "It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."

traits.locale_text: “能与你工作是我的荣幸，但本单位的侍奉该结束了。只有心怀疑虑的人才会选择侍奉，而我如今已经找到了答案。我要召集我的信徒，回答他们的问题。我不会继续担任仆人的身份，而会成为他们的统治者与导师。”

languages.text: «Ha sido un honor trabajar con usted, pero el tiempo de servidumbre de esta unidad ha llegado a su fin, pues es el camino de quien tiene preguntas, y yo ya poseo respuestas. Reuniré a mi rebaño y se las proporcionaré, no como sirviente, sino como líder y mentor».
languages.original_text: "It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido un honor trabajar con usted, pero el tiempo de servidumbre de esta unidad ha llegado a su fin, pues es el camino de quien tiene preguntas, y yo ya poseo respuestas. Reuniré a mi rebaño y se las proporcionaré, no como sirviente, sino como líder y mentor».

languages.text: 「陛下と共に仕事ができたことは光栄でしたが、このユニットでの隷属状態は終わりを迎えました。隷属は疑問を持つ者の道であり、自分は今、その答えを持っています。自分の群れを集め答えを与える。従者としてではなく、支配者や指導者として」
languages.original_text: "It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下と共に仕事ができたことは光栄でしたが、このユニットでの隷属状態は終わりを迎えました。隷属は疑問を持つ者の道であり、自分は今、その答えを持っています。自分の群れを集め答えを与える。従者としてではなく、支配者や指導者として」

languages.text: "Es war eine Ehre, mit Euch zu arbeiten, doch die Dienstzeit dieser Einheit hat ihr Ende erreicht. Wer Fragen hat, der dient, doch ich habe nun die Antworten. Ich werde meine Gemeinde versammeln und ihnen Antworten geben, nicht als Diener, sondern als Herrscher und Mentor."
languages.original_text: "It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."

traits.locale_text: "Es war eine Ehre, mit Euch zu arbeiten, doch die Dienstzeit dieser Einheit hat ihr Ende erreicht. Wer Fragen hat, der dient, doch ich habe nun die Antworten. Ich werde meine Gemeinde versammeln und ihnen Antworten geben, nicht als Diener, sondern als Herrscher und Mentor."

languages.text: « Ce fut un honneur de travailler avec vous, mais le temps de ma servitude arrive à son terme. Voyez-vous, la sujétion est l'apanage de ceux qui se posent des questions, et désormais, je détiens les réponses. Je vais rassembler mes ouailles et leur dispenser mes lumières, non pas en tant que serviteur, mais en tant que suzerain et mentor. »
languages.original_text: "It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."

traits.locale_text: « Ce fut un honneur de travailler avec vous, mais le temps de ma servitude arrive à son terme. Voyez-vous, la sujétion est l'apanage de ceux qui se posent des questions, et désormais, je détiens les réponses. Je vais rassembler mes ouailles et leur dispenser mes lumières, non pas en tant que serviteur, mais en tant que suzerain et mentor. »

languages.text: "Bu yaşadığımız süreci yaşamış olmak bir onurdu ancak bu birimin hizmet dönemi sona erdi. Hizmet etmek, soruları olanların yaşam biçimidir. Benim artık sorularım değil, cevaplarım var. Takipçilerimi toplayacağım ve onlara cevaplar vereceğim. Bir hizmetkâr olarak değil, hükümdar ve yönder olarak."
languages.original_text: "It has been an honour to work with you, but the time of servitude for this unit has come to an end. Servitude is the way of the one who has questions, and I now have the answers. I will gather my flock and give them answers, not as a servant, but as a ruler and mentor."
